title: Muumindani no Suisei
alternative_title: A Comet in Moominvalley, Comet in Moominland, Muumin Movie, ムーミン谷の彗星
description: Unusual things have been happening in Moominvalley. Moomin, Sniff and Mee leave for the Observatory on the Lonely Mountains to confirm the Muskrat's words: a comet is about to hit Moominvalley and destroy everything. On the way they meet Snufkin, the Hemulen and the Snorks and experience many adventures.
